citation.title: Solar Cells: Morphological Degradation in Low Bandgap Polymer Solar Cells - An In Operando Study (Adv. Energy Mater. 19/2016)

news.title: X-ray vision reveals how polymer solar cells wear out
news.summary: (Nanowerk News) Scientists from the Technical University of Munich have used the acurate X-ray vision provided by DESY's radiation source PETRA III to observe the degradation of plastic solar cells.

news.title: X-Ray Vision Helps to Examine Degradation of Plastic Solar Cells
news.summary: Oct 12 2016 The accurate X-ray vision offered by DESY’s radiation source PETRA III has been used by researchers from the Technical University of Munich to examine the degradation of plastic solar cells.
